## NgSelectPlugin interface

NgSelect plugin interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface NgSelectPlugin 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [ngSelectPlugins](./select.ngselectplugin.ngselectplugins.md) | <code>NgSelectPluginInstances</code> | NgSelect plugin instances available for this plugin |
|  [options](./select.ngselectplugin.options.md) | <code>any</code> | Options for NgSelect plugin |
|  [pluginElement](./select.ngselectplugin.pluginelement.md) | <code>ElementRef</code> | Element that represents plugin |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [initialize()](./select.ngselectplugin.initialize.md) | Initialize plugin, to be ready to use, initialize communication with other plugins |
|  [initOptions()](./select.ngselectplugin.initoptions.md) | Initialize plugin options, all operations required to be done with plugin options are handled here |
|  [invalidateVisuals()](./select.ngselectplugin.invalidatevisuals.md) | Explicitly runs invalidation of content (change detection) |
